data.text: @jonkay Like you can't think for yourself......Like livestock in fact.
@Dumbshowsnoise @jonkay But mailing has been proved to be ineffective as far as COVID is concerned.

@jonkay What the fuck is the problem? If you want to wear the mask and lockdown DO IT. Inserting the govt into these personal decisions is the problem, not the decision itself. 

This is such basic logic.
@Dumbshowsnoise @jonkay Exactly! Sweden probably isn't even a real country.🤣
@jonkay We can't possibly leave the children alone, darling, we just can't

@jonkay So, does leaving people on their own also include shutting down all information about Covid going forward? Or, is this fear porn designed to remind people that people do best when the government is thinking for them. Just a bit confused on this one.
@jonkay Improper mask storage (like in your back pocket) is a sure fire way of getting a bacterial lung infection. Better off not using them at all.

@jonkay Are people being conditioned to think/behave this way on purpose? Have the elites and Big Tech hedged their bets that America's decline is unavoidable and China's dominance inevitable? Thought American elites would put their country first but maybe this is the danger of globalism
